source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (timesheets) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_work_segment)
- **New Data:** where a Religion in the source does not exist as an ReligionCode in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Religion in source and ReligionCode in targReligionet where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an ReligionCode in the target exists but the same Disability_Text doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View timesheets_work_segment_new is created

%%sql
-- Build religion_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW timesheets_work_segment_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.segment_id IS NULL
        THEN T5.SegmentID
    END as TimesheetsWorkSegmentID, -- surrogate key
    T1.segment_id AS SegmentID,
    T4.EmployeeID AS EmployeeID,
    T1.segment_date AS SegmentDate,
    T1.start_time AS StartTime,
    T1.end_time AS EndTime,
    T1.case_reference AS CaseReference,
    T1.segment_type AS SegmentType,
    T1.worked_minutes AS WorkedMinutes,
    T1.created_at AS CreatedAt,
    T1.updated_at AS UpdatedAt,
    T1.case_display_name AS CaseDisplayName,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    T1.segment_date AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat( IFNULL(T1.segment_id,'.'), IFNULL(T4.EmployeeID,'.'), IFNULL(T1.segment_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.start_time,'.'), IFNULL(T1.end_time,'.'), 
                IFNULL(T1.case_reference,'.'), IFNULL(T1.segment_type,'.'), IFNULL(T1.worked_minutes,'.'), IFNULL(T1.created_at,'.'), 
                IFNULL(T1.updated_at,'.'), IFNULL(T1.case_display_name,'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive, 
    T5.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.timesheets_work_segment T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Timesheets" = T2.Description and T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_standardised_db.timesheets_employee T3 ON T1.employee_id = T3.employee_id
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact T4 ON T3.staff_number = T4.EmployeeNumber AND T4.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_work_segment_dim T5 ON T1.segment_id = T5.SegmentID AND T5.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
    (
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.segment_id = T5.SegmentID AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.segment_id,'.'), IFNULL(T4.EmployeeID,'.'), IFNULL(T1.segment_date,'.'), IFNULL(T1.start_time,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.end_time,'.'), IFNULL(T1.case_reference,'.'), IFNULL(T1.segment_type,'.'), IFNULL(T1.worked_minutes,'.'), IFNULL(T1.created_at,'.'), 
                    IFNULL(T1.updated_at,'.'), IFNULL(T1.case_display_name,'.')))  <> T5.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T5.TimesheetsWorkSegmentID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        ( CASE
            WHEN T1.segment_id IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END = 'Y' )
    )

# Run tests to check integrity of data by numbers
- This script checks for the total number of current codes in the harmonised table, and compare against the numbers for new data to be added and data to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tracking:** where it checks the data against active records in harmonised and compares with records to add and records to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tolerance levels:** if the total ammount to be added and deleted surpasses the tolerance limit, it will interrupt the proces of loading the data

# Run tests to check integrity of data by comparision of codes
- This script checks for the total list of current codes in the harmonised table, and compare against the list for new data to be added and data to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tracking:** where it checks the data against active records in harmonised and compares with records to add and records to be set as inactive.

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **religion_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View religion_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW timesheets_work_segment_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    TimesheetsWorkSegmentID,
    SegmentID,
    EmployeeID,
    SegmentDate,
    StartTime,
    EndTime,
    CaseReference,
    SegmentType,
    WorkedMinutes,
    CreatedAt,
    UpdatedAt,
    CaseDisplayName,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From timesheets_work_segment_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    TimesheetsWorkSegmentID,
    SegmentID,
    EmployeeID,
    SegmentDate,
    StartTime,
    EndTime,
    CaseReference,
    SegmentType,
    WorkedMinutes,
    CreatedAt,
    UpdatedAt,
    CaseDisplayName,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_work_segment_dim
WHERE SegmentID IN (SELECT SegmentID FROM timesheets_work_segment_new WHERE EmployeeID IS NULL)
AND IsActive = 'Y';

# View religion_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Religion from Personal Characteristics), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.religion_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_work_segment_dim AS Target
USING timesheets_work_segment_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.TimesheetsWorkSegmentID = Target.TimesheetsWorkSegmentID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.religion_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new ReligionID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_work_segment_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SegmentID NULLS LAST) AS TimesheetsWorkSegmentID,
    SegmentID,
    EmployeeID,
    SegmentDate,
    StartTime,
    EndTime,
    CaseReference,
    SegmentType,
    WorkedMinutes,
    CreatedAt,
    UpdatedAt,
    CaseDisplayName, 
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_work_segment_dim;

Select * FROM odw_harmonised_db.timesheets_work_segment_dim;
